Nadia Eskandar Zakhary bụ minista nyocha sayensị nke Ijipt n'etiti 2 Ọgọstụ 2012 na 2013. Ọ bụ akụkụ nke Cabinet Qandil na otu n'ime ndị minista nwere onwe ha na cabinet. Zachary bụ naanị onye otu na kabinet bụ onye otu Coptic Christian otu, na-anọchite anya ihe dịka pasenti iri nke ndị bi na ya.

Zakhary nwetara PhD na Medical Biochemistry na Mahadum Cairo. Ọ bụ prọfesọ nke biochemistry na tumor biology na Egypt's National Cancer Institute. Ọ bụkwa onye isi oche nke Ngalaba Oncology na Institute of Biology of tumors. O nwere ihe karịrị akwụkwọ nyocha 60 na akwụkwọ akụkọ sayensị mba ụwa Ọ rụkwara ọrụ dị ka minista nke nyocha sayensị na gọọmentị nwa oge nke Kamal Ganzouri duziri.
